verses.verse: Now the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

"The sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall camp, <WH2583> each <WH376> by his own standard, <WH1714> with the banners <WH226> of their fathers' households; <WH1004> they shall camp <WH2583> around <WH5439> the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> at a distance. <WH4480> <WH5048>

"Now those who camp <WH2583> on the east <WH9506> side <WH9506> toward the sunrise <WH4217> [shall be] of the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Judah, <WH3063> by their armies, <WH6635> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Judah: <WH3063> Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab, <WH5992>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 74600.

"And those who camp <WH2583> next <WH5921> to him [shall be] the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar, <WH3485> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Issachar: <WH3485> Nethanel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar, <WH6686>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 54400.
"Then [comes] the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun, <WH2074> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Zebulun: <WH2074> Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon, <WH2497>
and his army, <WH6635> even his numbered <WH6485> men, 57400.
"The total <WH3605> of the numbered <WH6485> men of the camp <WH4264> of Judah: <WH3063> 186400, by their armies. <WH6635> They shall set <WH5265> out first. <WH7223>

"On the south <WH8486> side <WH8486> [shall be] the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Reuben <WH7205> by their armies, <WH6635> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Reuben: <WH7205> Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur, <WH7707>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 46500.

"And those who camp <WH2583> next <WH5921> to him [shall be] the tribe <WH4294> of Simeon, <WH8095> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Simeon: <WH8095> Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai, <WH6701>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 59300.
"Then [comes] the tribe <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Gad: <WH1410> Eliasaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Deuel, <WH1845>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 45650.
"The total <WH3605> of the numbered <WH6485> men of the camp <WH4264> of Reuben: <WH7205> 151450 by their armies. <WH6635> And they shall set <WH5265> out second. <WH8145>

"Then the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150> shall set <WH5265> out [with] the camp <WH4264> of the Levites <WH3881> in the midst <WH8432> of the camps; <WH4264> just <WH9201> as they camp, <WH2583> so <WH3651> they shall set <WH5265> out, every <WH376> man <WH376> in his place, <WH3027> by their standards. <WH1714>

"On the west <WH3220> side <WH3220> [shall be] the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Ephraim <WH669> by their armies, <WH6635> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> [shall be] Elishama <WH476> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud, <WH5989>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 40500.

"And next <WH5921> to him [shall be] the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh: <WH4519> Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur, <WH6301>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 32200.
"Then [comes] the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin, <WH1144> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin: <WH1144> Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gideoni, <WH1441>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 35400.
"The total <WH3605> of the numbered <WH6485> men of the camp <WH4264> of Ephraim: <WH669> 108100, by their armies. <WH6635> And they shall set <WH5265> out third. <WH7992>

"On the north <WH6828> side <WH6828> [shall be] the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Dan <WH1835> by their armies, <WH6635> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Dan: <WH1835> Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai, <WH5996>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 62700.

"And those who camp <WH2583> next <WH5921> to him [shall be] the tribe <WH4294> of Asher, <WH836> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher: <WH836> Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ochran, <WH5918>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 41500.
"Then [comes] the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali, <WH5321> and the leader <WH5387> of the sons <WH1121> of Naphtali: <WH5321> Ahira <WH299> the son <WH1121> of Enan, <WH5881>
and his army, <WH6635> even their numbered <WH6485> men, 53400.
"The total <WH3605> of the numbered <WH6485> men of the camp <WH4264> of Dan, <WH1835> [was] 157600. They shall set <WH5265> out last <WH314> by their standards. <WH1714>"

These <WH428> are the numbered <WH6485> men of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> by their fathers' households; <WH1004> the total <WH3605> of the numbered <WH6485> men of the camps <WH4264> by their armies, <WH6635> 603550.
The Levites, <WH3881> however, were not numbered <WH6485> among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> just <WH9201> as the Lord <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

Thus the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did; <WH6213> according to all <WH3605> that the Lord <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses, <WH4872> so <WH3651> they camped <WH2583> by their standards, <WH1714> and so <WH3651> they set <WH5265> out, every <WH376> one <WH376> by his family, <WH4940> according <WH5921> to his father's household. <WH1004>
